decorator.label: JML
decorator.description: JML nature is enabled for this project

command.label: Compile RAC for selected files
command.tooltip: Compiles JML runtime checks for selected objects

command.label: Compile RAC for marked files
command.tooltip: Compiles JML runtime checks for marked objects

command.label: Choose RAC files
command.tooltip: Selects java files and folders for RAC

command.label: Mark for RAC
command.tooltip: Marks selected resources to be compiled with runtime checks

command.label: Unmark for RAC
command.tooltip: Disables selected resources from being compiled with runtime checks

command.label: Delete RAC files
command.tooltip: Deletes RAC-compiled class files for selected resources

command.label: Generate JML docs
command.tooltip: Generates javadoc pages containing JML specifications

command.label: Show counterexample value
command.tooltip: Shows the value of an expression in the counterexample

command.label: Show Proof Information
command.tooltip: Shows proof information for the selected method

command.label: Show Detailed Proof Attempt Information
command.tooltip: Shows internal proof attempt information for the selected method

command.label: Show Specifications
command.tooltip: Shows the specifications of the selected object

command.label: Open Specifications Editor
command.tooltip: Opens a specification file editor for the selected object

command.label: ESC
command.tooltip: Performs JML static checks for selected objects

command.label: RAC
command.tooltip: Compiles JML runtime checks for selected objects

command.name: RAC - compile selected
command.description: Compiles runtime checks on selected resources

command.name: RAC - compile marked
command.description: Compiles runtime checks on marked resources

command.name: RAC - choose files
command.description: Selects java files and folders for RAC

command.name: RAC - enable file
command.description: Marks files to be compiled with RAC

command.name: RAC - disable file
command.description: Disables files from being compiled with RAC

command.name: RAC - delete all class files
command.description: Delete all RAC-compiled class files

command.name: Show JML Specifications
command.description: Show the specifications of selected resources in a popup

command.name: Show ESC Result Information
command.description: Show proof information for the specified method

command.name: Show Detailed Proof Attempt Information
command.description: Shows internal proof attempt information for the specified method

command.name: Show Counterexample Value
command.description: Show value of expression in counterexample

command.name: Generate JML doc
command.description: Generates javadoc pages containing JML information

command.name: Open a Specifications Editor
command.description: Opens an editor on the corresponding specifications file

command.name: Open the ESC Results View
command.description: Opens a View showing the results of ESC for each method

command.name: Rerun Static Check
command.description: Reruns static checking on selected items

command.name: Clear All Results
command.description: Clears all Static Check results

command.name: Clear Selected Results
command.description: Clears selected Static Check results

command.name: Show Counterexample
command.description: Shows the Counterexample for the selected problem

command.name: insert requires true;
command.description: inserts a requires keyword

command.name: insert ensures true;
command.description: inserts a ensures keyword

command.name: insert assignable \everything;
command.description: inserts a assignable keyword

command.name: insert signals (Exception e) true;
command.description: inserts a signals keyword

command.name: insert \\result
command.description: inserts a \\result keyword

hover.description: Value of variable in current counterexample
hover.label: Counterexample Value
